column1: -#John Alexander Logan#1868#1871#Illinois#Issued General Order No. 11 on May 5
-#Paul Vandervoort#1882#1883#Nebraska#First enlisted man to be elected Commander-in-Chief. National Women's Relief Corps recognized as an official auxiliary to the G.A.R.
-#Wheelock Graves Veazey#1890#1891#Vermont#Peak membership of the GAR: 409
-#John Edward Gilman#1910#1911#Massachusetts#spoke at the Manassas Peace Jubilee; on this 1911 History his photograph is in the center row at the left
-#Theodore A. Penland#1948#1949#Oregon#Last Commander-in-Chief. Died in office
